ygData.subject: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all!, I thought I d say hello to you all.  I signed up for the list when I saw it on eqvault one day and thought it was a great idea.  I recently sold my 31
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all!,
I thought I'd say hello to you all. I signed up for the list when I
saw it on eqvault one day and thought it was a great idea. I recently sold
my 31 cleric on Tar Mar *waves to Nystul* because I never really got to
play with my friends there and the extra time in real life came in handy :)
But now that it seems more and more folks are thinkin about a guild, I'll
come on back in :) Being waay back in the closet in real life this will
give me a chance to hang out with actual gay folks. I don't even associate
with any in real life :(. This time around I think I'll do less power
leveling and more socializin' If others are congregating on a particular
server, post here to let us all know. Take care! *hugz*
